pr_title: KOGITO-1163 Call to Jobs service fails on OpenShift

timeline.message: KOGITO-1163 Call to Jobs service fails on OpenShift - fix url without host

timeline.bodyText:
Wouldn't it have more sense to thrown an exception in case jobServiceUrl is null?
From my point of view it is not valid value and we should fail fast.
timeline.author: sutaakar

replies.bodyText:
That is a point but when initializing the runtime with quarkus, in some step it instantiates the bean on CDI using the default constructor, with no args and in this case throwing an exception will break the startup, I tested it =/
See https://quarkus.io/guides/cdi-reference on item 5.4
replies.author: tiagodolphine
